snippet: South Korea and the United States began another round of military drills on Monday, but North Korea remained uncharacteristically silent.
abstract: South Korea and the United States begin another round of military drills; North Korea's criticism of the drills is less harsh than usual, which analysts say is a sign of the North's interest in continuing diplomacy.
lead_paragraph: South Korea and the United States began another round of military drills on Monday, but North Korea remained uncharacteristically silent.

headline.main: South Korea: U.S. Joins War Drills
headline.print_headline: South Korea: U.S. Joins War Drills
